name: ✨FREE FLOWCHART - C4 model for visualising software architecture
description:
If you have trouble communicating the architecture of a software graphically, you can't find the right way for your ideas to be easily understood.


The C4 model is the solution to all your problems, this model is an easy to learn, developer friendly approach to software architecture diagramming.
